briefdescription.para: Prints the measurement value and its uncertainty.

detaileddescription.para: This function formats and prints the peak position and its uncertainty with significant figures based on the uncertainty.

briefdescription.para: Fits a peak in the given histogram using TSpectrum and a Gaussian function.

detaileddescription.para: This function detects peaks in the histogram using TSpectrum and fits the detected peak with a Gaussian function. The fit results are returned as a TFitResultPtr.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the histogram to fit.
The ID of the crystal being analyzed.

briefdescription.para: Retrieves histograms for a specific crystal and the total charge from the input ROOT file.

detaileddescription.para: This function searches for and retrieves the specified histograms from the input file. It returns pointers to the crystal-specific histogram and the total charge histogram.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the input ROOT file.
Name of the total charge histogram.
Name of the histogram for the specific crystal.

simplesect.para: A tuple containing pointers to the crystal histogram and the total charge histogram.

briefdescription.para: Saves the fit results, histograms, and plots to an output ROOT file.

detaileddescription.para: This function writes the histogram, fit results, and canvas to the specified output file. It creates the output file if it does not exist or updates it if it does.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the canvas containing the fit plot.
Pointer to the histogram being analyzed.
Name of the output ROOT file.
